mapper.insert: insert into daily_excercise (weightNow, startTime, endTime, countNow, equipmentName, excerciseDay, rfidKey) values (#{weightNow}, NOW(), NOW() ,1, #{equipmentName}, #{excerciseDay}, #{rfidKey})
mapper.update: UPDATE fitness_equipment SET isStarted = IF(isStarted=0,1,0) WHERE equipmentId = #{equipmentId};
mapper.select: SELECT equipmentId, equipmentName, isStarted FROM fitness_equipment WHERE equipmentId = #{equipmentId};

SELECT d.equipmentName, weightNow, countNow, ROUND(6 * ROUND((HOUR(TIMEDIFF(endTime, startTime)) * 60 )+ (second(TIMEDIFF(endTime, startTime)) + MINUTE(TIMEDIFF(endTime, startTime)) * 60) / 60) * weightNow / 60) AS carlorie, date_format(TIMEDIFF(endTime, startTime), '%i:%s') AS exTime, f.equipmentStimulate, f.equipmentEnglishStimulate, u.gender FROM daily_excercise d JOIN fitness_equipment f ON d.equipmentName = f.equipmentName JOIN user u on u.rfidKey = d.rfidKey WHERE d.weightNow = #{weightNow} AND d.rfidKey = #{rfidKey} AND d.equipmentName=#{equipmentName} AND d.excerciseDay = DATE(NOW());
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY endTime DESC) as id, equipmentName, weightNow, countNow FROM daily_excercise WHERE rfidKey = #{rfidKey} AND excerciseDay = DATE(NOW()) ORDER BY endTime DESC;
